Djama expects to earn an average income of 90,000 FCFA per farming cycle. The money she earns will allow her to repay her loan and help her husband pay for their daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy the agricultural inputs needed to maintain half a hectare of farmland

loans.name: Sherlinita

texts.en:
Sherlinita is married with only 1 child. Sherlinita is 52 years old and lives in Looc Proper, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental.

Sherlinita sells peanuts to earn a living and has had this business for 23 years. Each month she earns PHP 3,000 from doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for PHP 6,000 to purchase peanuts and other ingredients.

Sherlinita has been a member of PMPC for 9 years.  In the future, Sherlinita hopes to have enough savings for her family's future.

loans.use: To purchase peanuts and other ingredients

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is married with 3 children. Josephine is 41 years old and lives in Sebac, Tudela.

Josephine sells a variety of products to earn a living and has had this business for 5 years. Each month she earns PHP 3,000 from doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for PHP 15,000 to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc.

Josephine has been a member of PMPC for 7 years.  In the future, Josephine hopes to save for future emergencies.

loans.use: To purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc.

loans.name: Sababoumandogo  V Group

texts.fr:
Les cinq membres du groupe SABABOUMANDOGO V sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 37 ans,  3 enfants  et vivant toutes dans des  familles traditionnelle à  M’PEDOUGOU, un des villages de la 3ème région administrative du Mali (SIKASSO).
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur huitième prêt de campagne agricole avec l’institution et tous les prêts précédents ont été correctement remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est : pois sucré  avec  NANZAN  au milieu de la photo position débout.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants et payer les frais de labour,  pour entretenir : 1 hectare. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village, après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes.
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 200 000FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi de réinvestir dans l’entreprise.
texts.en:
The five members of the Sababoumandogo V Group are married women with an average age of 37 years and an average of three children. They live in traditional families in M'Pedougou, one of the villages in the third administrative region of Mali (Sikasso).

They work with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry out their farming businesses during the rainy season. They are on their eighth loan cycle for rural agriculture, and all of their prior loans have been repaid in full.

Nanzan (shown in the photo standing in the center of the back row), grows crops of sweet peas. With her ​​loan, she intends to buy agricultural inputs and pay for the labor cost of maintaining one hectare of farmland. After the harvest, produce is sold in the village to a clientele composed of men and women.

Nanzan expects to earn an average income of 200,000 FCFA per agricultural cycle. The money she earns will allow her to repay her loan and to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs and pay for the labor cost of maintaining one hectare of farmland.

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en: Ms Shamim is 49 years old and a mother of six children. Eight years ago, she started her business of milk sales. She initiated her own business by buying a buffalo to support her family when her husband was the only bread earner at that point in time. With the passage of time her sales increased and also her income. This has all happened due to her courage and determination. Because of her work, she is respected in her home. She helps her husband in all family matters as well as financial matters. She has some savings and applied a loan of Rs. 30000 to purchase another buffalo. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. She is very thankful to Kashf for its support.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Mumtaz

texts.en: Ms Mumtaz is a 53-year-old married woman. For the past 6 years, she has been successfully running a business of milk sales in her community. Over the time, Mumtaz has become famous in her area for providing good quality milk. She counts a good client list and makes enough to contribute to her family's income. Mumtaz is requesting a loan of Rs. 30,000 PKR loan through the Kashf Foundation to purchase another cow to inflate her sales. She expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and plans to spend her profits on expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase another cow to inflate her sales.

loans.name: Francia

texts.en:
Francia is 57 years old and lives in Lopoc, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married with four children.

To earn a living, Francia has a business selling a variety of foods for snacks. She earns about 2,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) each month doing this type of work. Delia has requested a loan to purchase more ingredients for her snacks and viand (meals) business.

Francia has been a member of PMPC for four years. In the future, Francia would like to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more ingredients for her snacks and viand (meals) business.

loans.name: Shaheda

texts.en: Ms Shaheda is a 33-year-old married woman and a mother of seven children. She faced many financial problems in her early married life as it was very tough for Shaheda to manage her house needs with the small income of her husband. Therefore she decided to help her husband in earning. For this purpose she started her business of clothes selling as she buys used clothes in different colors and designs and then after proper cleaning and ironing sells in her area. Now she is playing a very important role for her family. To inflate her sales she wants a loan of Rs. 15000/- to purchase stocks of summer clothes in different designs. It would increase her earnings and hence she can better support the needs of her family members.

loans.use: to purchase stocks of summer clothes in different designs.

loans.name: Ishrat

texts.en: Ms Ishrat is a married woman. She, along with her husband, is in the business of making artificial jewelery for many years. She beautifully makes necklaces, earring and bracelets in many colors and designs. The business has great potential for growth and Ishrat is actively helping her husband as this business is the only source of income for them. She has six children; two of them are going to school. In order to meet the orders on time and boost their sales, Ishrat requested for a loan of 30,000 PKR to purchase raw material such as silver, gold and dozens of artificial gems and pearls. She is in her 2nd loan cycle and hopes to get increase in their net income and intends to use part of it on providing good and quality education to her children.

loans.use: to purchase raw material such as silver, gold and dozens of artificial gems and pearls.

loans.name: Iqbal

texts.en: Ms Iqbal is a married woman; she has been successfully running a small general store with her husband at the corner of her house. She has 5 years of experience in this field.  Her husband also assists her by purchasing stock of goods from the market as he has maintained many contacts in years. She is a mother of four children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health. She wants to grow her business so she requested a loan of PKR 50,000 to buy packs of salts, oil, biscuits and beverages to meet with the increasing demand at her store. She has been in association with Kashf Fondation since six years and has shown excellent repayment behavior. Iqbal is expecting boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salts, oil, biscuits and beverages to meet with the increasing demand at her store.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Juan Carlos, de 29 años de edad el se dedica a la elaboracion y venta de pan, y tambien como actividad secundaria se dedica a la crianza de animales, se a dedica a esta actividad desde hace 4 años y gracias a Dios le a ido bien en su negocio y esta solicitando este credito para la compra de arina y materiales para la ealboracion de pan, y tambien para la compra de animales para la crianza.
texts.en: Juan Carlos, 29, works making and selling bread and as a secondary activity raises animals.  He’s been in this activity for four years and thanks to God he’s done well in business.  He’s asking for this loan to buy flour and other bread baking supplies and also to buy animals to raise.

loans.use: to buy flour and other baking supplies and to buy animals to raise.

loans.name: Kalsoom

texts.en: Ms Kalsoom is a 32-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband at the corner of her house. The man shown in the photo is Kalsoom’s husband. Her husband also assists her by purchasing stock of goods from the market and dealing with customers by sitting at the shop. Over the time they have become popular in their community for providing good quality products and make enough to meet the expenses of their two children. Currently, she requested a loan of Rs. 30,000 to buy stock of rice, grains and sugar to meet with the increasing demand at her store. She is expecting boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy stock of rice, grains and sugar to meet with the increasing demand at her store.

loans.name: Shabana

texts.en: Ms Shabana is 34 year old vigorous lady; she has been stitching clothes for many years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. She is a mother of six children and motivated to provide them a beautiful life with good food, health and education. By the time she attained regular list of customers but for now, due to lack of availability of funds she is unable to meet with the daily demands of her customers. For this reason she requested a loan of Rs 25,000 to Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan amount to buy more spools of threads in different colors with the packs of laces, zippers and buttons to create a means of increasing revenues so she may able to generate healthier source of income. She is in her 2nd loan cycle and is thankful to Kashf for its tremendous support. She wants good quality education for her children.

loans.use: to buy more spools of threads in different colors with the packs of laces, zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Shabana

texts.en: Ms Shabana is a 26-year-old married woman. She is a very talented lady and excels in her work of stitching clothes. She has gotten a lot of appreciation from her community and makes enough to contribute in the family income. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. Currently she requested a loan of PKR.20,000 to purchase more reels of threads with the packs of buttons, zippers and laces in various colors. In this way she will be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. Shabana hopes to grow her business and dreams of providing good standard of living to her family members.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of threads with the packs of buttons, zippers and laces in various colors.

loans.name: Hugo Efrain

texts.es: El Sr. Hugo tiene 33 años, tiene dos hijos de las edades de 2 años y un bebe de 8 meses, el  se dedica a la venta de celulares,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, el Sr. Hugo va a utilizar  este préstamo  para la compra de mercadería celulares por mayor para surtir su negocio,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es incrementar su capital  de trabajo, El Sr. Hugo enfrenta retos en su negocio que son tener una buena venta y  va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir comprando mercadería para seguir mejorando su negocio y así de esta manera seguir generando más ingresos y por ende  mejorar su calidad de vida, el Sr. Hugo se siente feliz y agradecido por la oportunidad que le brindan ya que esta la única actividad que permite mantener a su familia.
texts.en: Hugo, 33, has two children aged 2 and 8 months.  He works selling mobile phones.  This loan is his first sequence in the institution and Hugo will use it to buy mobile phone merchandise at wholesale to stock his business.  His reason for requesting the loan is to increase his working capital.  The business challenge Hugo faces is to increase sales.  He will use profits to continue buying merchandise to continue improving his business thus continuing to generate more income and as a result improving his quality of life.  Hugo feels happy and grateful for the opportunity being granted since this is the only activity he has that allows him to support his family.

loans.use: to buy mobile phones at wholesale.

loans.name: Shahmeem

texts.en: Ms Shahmeem is a 40-year-old married woman and a mother of five children. She is trying hard to fulfill their demands, including food, health, clothing, and education. She is doing a business of animals’ sales and purchase for the past 12 years. She is contentedly doing it for the sake of her family. It’s her 2nd year with Kashf Foundation; currently she applied a loan of Rs. 30,000 to purchase two more goats. She is satisfied with the support of Kashf foundation and wants to grow her business to provide good quality food, heath and education to her children.

loans.use: to purchase two more goats.

loans.name: Nabila

texts.en: Ms Nabila is a 31-year-old married woman. She is doing business of tailoring for the past ten years with the support of her husband. The man shown in the photo is Nabila’s husband who is a tailor by profession. She accepted the fact that if her husband works alone for the family, they will not be able to meet the expenses of household. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating a business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. Now she requested for a loan of Rs. 35,000/- to purchase more reels of threads with the packs of buttons and laces in various colors. In this way they will be able to complete the orders of their customers’ on time. Nabila wants to grow her business in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of threads with the packs of buttons and laces in various colors.

loans.name: Yasmeen

texts.en: Ms Yasmeen is a 34-year-old married woman. She is a vigorous lady and, for the past three years, has been running a business of cloths sales. She buys cloths of different fabrics in various colors and designs from the market at wholesale rates and then sells them to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business. Yasmeen is requesting a loan of Rs. 20,000 from the Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of cloths in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory. Yasmeen expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and she plans to spend the part of her profits for the betterment of her family members. she is in her 2nd loan cycle with good repayment history.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of cloths in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory.

loans.name: Sumaira

texts.en: Ms Sumaira is 26 years old married woman and a mother of three children; two sons and one daughter. She has been running a business of animals’ sales and purchase for many years. She buys animals (baby goats & baby cows) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. In order to purchase one more cow she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied a loan of Rs. 15,000.  She hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en: Ms Parveen is a 41-year-old, married woman and a mother of three. She has been running a business of cloth trading for many years. She purchases a variety of cloth from the main city and then sells it to the people of her vicinity. Over the time, she has become famous for selling good quality cloths in her community. Parveen requested a loan of PKR 25000 from Kashf Foundation to buy a stock of different cloth for the summer season by taking into account the choices and tastes of her customers. In this way, she would be able to earn more income through her greater sales. She is in her 3rd loan cycle and hopes to have a good experience with this new. She dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard efforts in her business.

loans.use: to buy a stock of different cloth for the summer season by taking into account the choices and tastes of her customers.

loans.name: Sajida

texts.en: Ms Sajida aged 32 enjoys her work of packing and selling tamarind for 6 years now. It is a popular street item in a country like Pakistan. Mostly females are fond of eating it as it has sour and sweet taste. Sajida is doing this business with the support of her husband. The man shown in the photo is Sajida’s husband who assists her in purchasing a stock of tamarind from the market. After doing packing they sell it to the people of their vicinity and make enough to fulfill the needs of their two children.  Now Sajida requested a loan of Rs 25,000 PKR to buy good taste tamarind in bulk with the bundles of wrapping sheets which will help in increasing sales. She hopes to earn more profits and will use the part of profits on her children’s education, better health and food.

loans.use: to buy good taste tamarind in bulk with the bundles of wrapping sheets.

loans.name: Irshad

texts.en: Ms Irshad is a 44-year-old married woman and a mother of four children. She is doing business of stitching since 5 years to support her husband. Income of her husband is low to bear the household expenses alone. That is why Irshad is working hard to continually provide for her family. She very well knows the techniques of stitching and earns enough to lead a decent life.. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  To help her continue operations of her business, she requested for a loan of Rs.35000/- to buy a stock of threads in different colors with the packs of zippers and laces to meet up with the increasing demand. She is in her 6th loan cycle with good repayment history. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenues to deal with personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy a stock of threads in different colors with the packs of zippers and laces to meet up with the increasing demand.

loans.name: Saba

texts.en: Ms Saba is a 26-year-old married woman who deals in a business of animals’ sales and purchase.  She is efficiently running her business to contribute in the family income as her husband’s income is not sufficient to meet the household expenses alone. She buys animals (baby goats & baby cows) at low prices, brings them and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf foundation; currently she requested a loan of Rs. 15,000 to purchase two more goats. She is in her 2nd loan cycle with good repayment history.  She hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her two children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase two more goats.

loans.name: Kishwar

texts.en: Ms Kishwar is 40 years old married woman and mother of four children. The man shown in the photo is Kishwar’s husband who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. For this reason, Kishwar has applied for a loan of Rs 30,000, for her husband. He wants to buy new tires for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Kishwar is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires for her husband's vehicle.

loans.name: Irshad

texts.en: Ms Irshad is a 35 year old married woman and a mother of five children. She has been successfully running a business of milk sales in her community. Over the time, she has become famous in her area for providing good quality milk. She counts a good client list and makes enough to contribute to her family's income. She is in her 2nd loan cycle; currently she requested a loan of Rs. 25,000 to purchase one more cow. She expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and plans to spend her profits on expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: Filemon

texts.es:
El señor Filemon es de la ciudad de Curuguaty, es representante de la comisión Pro Agua de la Colonia Fortuna B° 12 de junio. Actualmente cuentan con 17 usuarios del servicio de agua potable, que mediante mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio lograron instalar el tanque en dicha localidad.
La comisión con la que trabaja es muy unida a parte de abonar mensualmente por la utilización del agua realizan también actividades para recaudar más dinero y cubrir gastos extras que se presenten ocasionalmente. El motor bomba se había descompuesto y es por ello que solicita este crédito, para la compra de un nuevo motor de distribución de agua, que le permitirá seguir trabajando en ayuda a la comunidad y los consumidores.
texts.en:
Filemón is from the city of Curuguaty and he’s the representative for the Fortuna B° 12 de junio neighborhood water commission.  They currently have 17 subscribers to the potable water service; by means of great effort and sacrifice they succeeded in installing a tank in said location.

The commission he works in is very unified.  In addition to paying the monthly quotas for water utilization they also carry out fund-raising activities to earn more money to cover extra expenses that arise occasionally.

The water pump broke and this is why he’s asking for this loan in order to buy a new water pump for water distribution that will make it possible to continue working helping consumers and the community.

loans.use: to buy a water pump.

loans.name: Ashran

texts.en: Ms Ashran is a 32-year-old married woman and a mother of three children. She is doing business of tailoring since 5 years to support her husband. She accepted the fact that if her husband works alone for their family, they will not be able to meet the expenses of household with the educational needs of children. That is why she started tailoring at home to support her family well. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating a business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. Now she requested for a loan of Rs. 20000/- to purchase more reels of threads, packs of buttons and laces. In this way she will be able to complete the orders of her customers on time; her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. Ashran hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of threads, packs of buttons and laces.

loans.name: Belen

texts.en:
Belen is married and has four children. She is 53 years old and lives in Gata Daku, Clarin. She sells a variety of products at a general store, to earn a living. She has had this business for three years. Each month, she earns PHP 1,500 doing this type of work. 

Belen has requested a loan for 4,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase additional products to resell, such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, and detergents. Belen has been a member of PMPC for a month.  In the future, she hopes to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to resell, such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, and detergents

location.town: Tudela-Gata Daku, Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Mind

loans.name: El Paraiso Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socios emprendedores exitosos  una de ellas es Benicia mujer de 61 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos mayores. Su negocio es una pulpería que tiene más 10 años en su domicilio, su negocio es reconocido en su comunidad a quienes les vende sus productos, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, carne de pollo, carne de res, salsa de tomate, queso, crema, leche en bolsa, cosméticos, artículos escolares, gaseosas variadas, ropa variada, sardinas, especies, verduras algodón etc., Orlando tiene 55 años de edad su negocio es la venta de fritanga en su domicilio y Martha tiene 58 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de productos de librerías.
texts.en:
This group consists of three members who are successful entrepreneurs. One of them is Benicia, a 61-year-old woman who is married and has two grown children. Her business is a store that she has managed from her home for more than 10 years. Benicia’s business is well-known in the community for the products she sells. Her loan will be invested in the purchase of basic grains, such as rice, as well as beans, sugar, oil, chicken, beef, tomato sauce, cheese, cream, bags of milk, cosmetics, school supplies, different sodas, a variety of clothing, sardines, spices, vegetables, cotton, and other items.

Orlando is 55 years old and has business of selling fried foods from his home. Martha is 58 years old and has a business of selling bookstore items.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, chicken, beef, tomato sauce, cheese, cream, bags of milk, cosmetics, school supplies, different sodas, a variety of clothing, sardines, spices, vegetables, cotton, and other items.

loans.name: Sumaira

texts.en: Ms Sumaira is 25 years old married woman. She has been running a business of beauty parlor for the last two years. She accepted the fact that income of her husband is not enough to meet all expenses. She offers many facilities to her customers such as makeup, hair styling and facials. Through her best providing services she has become very famous in her street. In order to meet with the increasing demands of her customers, she is interested in buying more variety of cosmetic products for the parlor.  But because of having low cash in hand she contacted Kashf Foundation to apply for her 1st loan. She needs a loan of PKR 25000/ to buy hair care products, skin products and creams of bleaching and whitening in large quantities. She is hopeful to cater more customers time after time with the help of this loan. She has a dream to make her own home in community where she lives.

loans.use: to buy hair care products, skin products and creams of bleaching and whitening in large quantities.

loans.name: Akram

texts.en: Ms Akram is a 55-year-old married woman doing a business of milk selling for the past 10 years. She has 2 calves and 2 cows in milk. She sells their milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter and cheese that she makes from the milk. Her business is good enough to lead her decent life. She has five children; one son is school going and two sons are working in a small factory. She is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life with good education, food and clothing.  She has improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation to meet day to day expenses of life. Currently she applied a loan of Rs. 30000 to purchase another cow. In this way she would be able to inflate her sales which ultimately help in bringing more cash.

loans.use: to purchase another cow.

loans.name: Aamna

texts.en: Ms Aamna is a 20-year-old married woman and a mother of two. One year ago, she started a business of hand-embroidery. She makes beautiful embroidery patterns for the people of her community. Her designs are much in demand and she has managed to consolidate a clientele that allows her to contribute to the expenses of her home. To help her to continue her operations, she has requested for a loan of Rs. 20,000 to buy reels of threads in different colors and packs of beads, sequins and stones for its embellishment. In this way she would be able to cater more customers consistently. She is hopeful to get increase in her income by targeting more customers. Aamna dreams for her children's bright future and desires to build her own house as she is living in a rented house with her family. She is in her 4th loan cycle with good repayment history and is very much thankful to Kashf for its tremendous support.

loans.use: to buy reels of threads in different colors and packs of beads, sequins and stones for its embellishment.

loans.name: Talqeen

texts.en: Ms Talqeen is a 47 year old married woman; she is doing a business of milk sales for the past 6 years. She has one cow. She sells its milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter and that she makes from the milk. Her business is good enough to lead her decent life. She has six children and she is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life with good education, food and clothing.  She has improved her business to meet day to day expenses of life.  It’s her fifth year with Kashf Foundation; she is happily running her business through support of it. Now she requested a loan of Rs. 45,000 to purchase one more cow and feed for its calves. She hopes to get increase in the production capacity of milk which ultimately helps in generating more cash.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow and feed for its calves.

loans.name: Bevi

texts.en: Ms Bevi, age 53, an energetic married woman. She is in business of selling bangles for many years. She always has a grate collection to offer to her customers and makes enough to meet the expenses of her family members. She is running this business for the past thirteen years. She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation; currently she applied a loan of Rs. 60,000 to purchase a variety of bangles in different colors and designs. This will help her to fulfill the demands of her customers consistently. She dreams of providing a good standard of living for her family

loans.use: to purchase a variety of bangles in different colors and designs.

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en: Ms Shazia is 41 years old married woman and a mother of one child. Her husband is Tailor but his income is not sufficient to meet the household expenses alone. So she joined his business and started stitching clothes of the people of her community. She is well familiar with the stitching techniques. She initiated her business with the support of Kashf foundation. At present, she enjoys a great client list and has gained a lot of appreciation and popularity in her community. She is in her 8th loan cycle; currently she requested a loan of Rs 40,000 to buy a stock of threads in different colors with the packs of laces, buttons and needles. So then she would be able to meet the demands of her customers without fail. She expects boost in her earnings and wishes to spend the part of profits on the expansion of her business.

loans.use: to buy a stock of threads in different colors with the packs of laces, buttons and needles.

loans.name: Sakina

texts.en: Ms Sakina is 41 year old vigorous lady and a mother four children. She is striving hard to meet their demands including food, clothing, and health. She has been stitching clothes for many years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to lack of availability of funds she is unable to meet with the daily demands of her customers. For this reason she requested a loan of Rs 20,000 to Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan amount to buy more spools of threads in different colors with the packs of laces, zippers and needles to create a means of increasing revenues so she may able to generate healthier source of income. She is in her 2nd loan cycle and thankful to Kashf for its tremendous support.

loans.use: to buy more spools of threads in different colors with the packs of laces, zippers and needles

loans.name: Miryam Flor

texts.es:
Muryam de 51 años de edad, es una mujer con grandes ideales, su familia se ha convertido en el principal motor de su vida y luchar por sacar a sus hijos adelante es el gran reto de cada día.
Desde hace 10 años montó un cibercafé con el fin de generar los recursos para la supervivencia familiar debido  a su condición de madre soltera. 
Asegura que las ventas son estables y que la actividad es rentable. 
En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de un computador y artículos de papelería, con el fin de brindar un mejor servicio e incrementar el volumen de ventas.
texts.en:
Muryam is 51 years old and is a woman with grand ideals.  Her family has become the main engine of her existence and her challenge it working hard every day to get her family ahead. She started a cyber café ten years ago so that she could generate resources with which to support her family, since she is a single mother.

She assures us that her sales are stable and that this activity is profitable.

She is asking for a loan to buy a computer and paper goods so that she can provide better service and increase her sales.

loans.use: to buy a computer and paper goods.

loans.name: Sinignessigui  I Group

texts.fr:
Les dix membres du groupe SINIGNESSIGUI I sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 43 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles traditionnelle à  LOBOUGOULA, un des villages de la 3ème région administrative du Mali (SIKASSO).
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur septième prêt de campagne agricole avec l’institution et tous les prêts précédents ont été correctement remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est : riz  avec  MADIARA  au milieu de la photo position débout.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants et payer les frais de labours  pour entretenir : 1 hectare. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village, après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes.
 Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 190 000FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi de réinvestir le reste dans l’entreprise.
texts.en:
The ten members of the Sinignessigui I Group are married women with an average age of 43 years and an average of four children. They live in traditional families in Lobougoula, one of the villages in the third administrative region of Mali (Sikasso).

They work with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry out their farming businesses during the rainy season. They are on their seventh agricultural loan cycle with the institution, and all of their prior loans have been repaid in full.

Madiara (shown in the photo standing in the center of the back row), grows crops of rice. With her ​​loan, she intends to buy agricultural inputs and pay for the labor cost of maintaining one hectare of farmland. After the harvest, produce is sold in the village to a clientele composed of men and women.

Madiara expects to earn an average income of 190,000 FCFA per agricultural cycle. The money she earns will allow her to repay her loan and to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs and pay for the labor cost of maintaining one hectare of farmland

loans.name: Arriza

texts.en:
Arriza is a 41-year-old married woman with seven children, four of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Arriza has a fishing business in the Philippines and she has requested a loan of PHP 13000 through the Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation to purchase additional materials like paints, wood, bamboo, etc. for fishing maintenance.

Arriza has been in this business for 21 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials like paints, wood, bamboo, etc. for fishing maintenance.

loans.name: Adina

texts.ru: Адина жизнерадостная женщина. Ей 55 лет. Она замужем и имеет 3 детей. Ее дети совершеннолетние. Ее муж имеет свой бизнес. Адина более 30 лет занимается купле продажей. Она в начале продавала конфеты, а потом перешла на купле продажи детской одежды. Ее эффективность помогает ей быть успешной в бизнесе. Она продает свой товар на местном рынке и имеет большой круг клиентов. У нее тонкий вкус и она умеет выбрать товар, который имеет большой спрос. Она должна купить товар для нового сезона, но не имеет достаточного средства для этого. Она запрашивает займ на сумму  2000 долларов США для покупки товара для нового сезона. Она кредитуется уже 13 цикл и использовала прежние займы для развития бизнеса. Она ждет вашу доброту и обещает погасить займ во время.
texts.en: Adina is a cheerful woman. She is 55 years old. She is married and has 3 children. Her children are adults. Her husband has his own business. Adina has more than 30 years of experience in buying and selling. She started selling candy, and then moved to the sale and purchase of children's clothing. Her efficiency helps her to be successful in business. She sells her goods in the local market and has a large number of clients. She has good taste and she knows how to choose a product that has high demand. She has to buy new products for the new season, but does not have sufficient means to do so. She is asking for a loan of 2,000 USD for the purchase of goods for the new season. She has already been credited thirteen times, and used the old loans for business development. She awaits your kindness and promises to repay the loan on time.

loans.use: To buy clothes for the new season

loans.name: Khayry

texts.ru: Хайри женщина, которая не может видеть свою семью в недостатке. Она всегда старается зарабатывать много денег. Хайри замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Ее муж занимается выращиванием сельхоз культуры. Уже несколько лет она помогает своему мужу, но их доход не хватает для улучшения условия проживания. Хайри решила организовать свой бизнес. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес купле продажей индустриальных товаров. От полученного дохода она планирует обеспечить своих детей с хорошим образованием и высококалорийными продуктами питания. Она запрашивает займ на сумму  3000 сомони для покупки товара, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Khayry is a woman, who cannot stand to see her family in need.  She always tries to earn more money.  Khayry is married and raising two children.  Her husband is involved in growing agricultural crops.  She has been helping her husband for several years now, but their income is not enough for improving their living conditions.  Khayry decided to organize her own business.  With this goal in mind, she completed the "Achieve Success" course, organized by the Association of Business Women, and obtained a certificate.  Now she is fully capable of starting her business and becoming successful in this field.  She wants to organize a business of buying and selling industrial goods.  She plans to use the resulting income to provide her children with good education and high-calorie food products.  Khayry is requesting a loan in the amount of 3000 somoni to purchase merchandise in order to start the new business.  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise in order to start the new business

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is 40 years old and lives in Palilan, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has three children. She is engaged in rice cultivation, and she earns approximately PHP 8,000 each month doing this type of work.

Gloria has requested a loan, which she will use to purchase fertilizers and chemical sprays for her rice production activity. She has been a member of PMPC for almost six years. In the future, Gloria hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and chemical sprays for growing rice

loans.name: Jorissa

texts.en:
Jorissa is 28 years old and lives in Palomoc, Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay. She is married and has two children. To earn a living, Jorissa sells meat loaf and chicken loaf. She earns about 3,000 each month doing this type of work.

Jorissa has a requested a loan to purchase more chicken loaf and meat loaf to sell at retail. She has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, she would like to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more chicken loaf and meat loaf to sell at retail

loans.name: Loreta

texts.en:
This is Loreta, who previously accessed a 20,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help in her personal, household and business expenditures.

Loreta is requesting another 15,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her current inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better, as more items to sell will result in greater profit. Her profits will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs, and she looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Loreta dreams that her business will continue to grow and hopes that her children will have stable jobs. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies there.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners who gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace, a 45-year-old married mother of five, lives in Taboo, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental where she sells fish in the local community. In business for five years, she earns PHP 5,000 monthly.

In 2010, Grace joined GDMPC micro finance to gain access to financial services. She is now requesting a loan of PHP 15,000 for additional capital to increase the variety of fish she sells in order to increase her income.

loans.use: to add capital to her business.

loans.name: Rahat

texts.en: Ms Rahat is 47 years old married lady and is running a small general store in her community for many years.  She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. She makes enough to provide for her family. She is a mother of two children and is motivated to provide for her family. To make her store fully stocked she requested a loan for Rs 50,000 which she will use to buy rice, sugar and flour from the market at lower rates. In this way she would be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. She is in her 6th loan cycle with good repayment history. Rahat wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar and flour from the market at lower rates.

loans.name: Gulchehra

texts.ru: Гулчехра трудолюбивая женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Она много лет не имела источника дохода. Так как ее муж имеет маленькую зарплату и не в состоянии обеспечить своих детей со всеми не обходимыми средствами. Дети год за годом требуют больше благ, так как они развеваются вместе с развевающимся миром. Она решила организовать бизнес купле продажей сухофруктов, так как сухофрукты имеют большой спрос на местном рынке. Она долго искала помощь и наконец, она узнала о курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованной Ассоциация Деловых Женщин. Она участвовала на этом курсе и получила много позитива для себя. После завершения курса она получила сертификат. Теперь она готова начать бизнес, однако она не имеет денег, чтобы купить сухофруктов. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки сухофруктов. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Gulchehra is a hardworking woman.  She is married and raising two children.  She has not had a source of income for many years.  Because her husband has a small salary, they are not able to provide their children with all of the necessities.  The children demand more comforts year-after-year because they develop together with the developing world.  Gulchehra decided to organize a business of buying and selling dried fruits because dried fruits are in high demand at a local market.  She searched for help for a long time and finally learned about the "Achieve Success" course, organized by the Association of Business Women.  She participated in this course and got a lot of positivity for herself.  She obtained a certificate after completing the course.  Now she is ready to start the business, but does not have money to purchase dried fruits.  Gulchehra is requesting a loan in the amount of 3000 somoni to purchase dried fruits.  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase dried fruits and start her new business

loans.name: Rubina

texts.en: Ms Rubina is 30-years-old and is a dedicated mother of four children. She is efficiently doing a business of animals' sales for many years. She has one buffalo and two goats. She purchases small goats and calves and by bringing them up sells near an event of Eid-ul-Azha (a religious event in Muslim countries like Pakistan). She earns a good profit from this business. Because of her work, she is respected in her home. She helps her husband in all family matters as well as financial matters. While talking to the Kashf officer, she shared the feeling of achievement she got by sending her son to college for further studies. Currently, she requested a loan of Rs. 20,000 to purchase two more goats. She is in her 6th loan cycle with good repayment history. She wishes to spend the part of revenue on the expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase two more goats.

loans.name: Maqsoodan

texts.en: Ms Maqsoodan is a 42-year-old married woman and a mother of three children. She has been successfully running a small general store in her community for the last four years. She offers various items and goods for everyday use. She has good communication skills and has a good client list. Her husband is a sales person in a garment shop and earns insufficient income to support his family alone. She is a mother of three children. She is motivated to provide for her family. She wants to grow her business so she requested a loan of PKR 25,000 to buy a stock of detergents and other grocery items such as grains, pulses and sugar in large quantities to meet with the increasing demand at her store. She wishes to spend part of the revenues to deal with the expenses of her children’s education and to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy a stock of detergents and other grocery items such as grains, pulses and sugar in large quantities to meet with the increasing demand at her store.

loans.name: Farnaz

texts.en: Ms Farnaz, age 30, is a married woman who deals in a business of animals’ sales and purchase. She has gain 10 years of experience in this field. She buys animals (baby goats & baby cows) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. Her business is good enough to lead her decent life and she has improved her business to meet day to day expenses of life. For the expansion of her business she has contacted Kashf Foundation and applied a loan of Rs. 25000 to purchase one more cow.  It’s her 2nd year with Kashf Foundation and she has shown good repayment history. She hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a better standard of living to her family members through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: Surriya

texts.en: Ms Surriya is a 33-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband at the corner of her house. The man shown in the photo is Surriya’s husband who assists her by purchasing stock of goods from the market and dealing with customers by sitting at the shop. Over the time they have become popular in their community for providing good quality products and make enough to meet the expenses of their four children. Currently, she requested a loan of Rs. 20,000 to buy packs of salts, biscuits and beverages with some cleaning products such as soaps and detergents. to meet with the increasing demand at her store. She is expecting boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salts, biscuits and beverages with some cleaning products such as soaps and detergents.

loans.name: Hamida

texts.en: Ms Hamida is 51 years old married woman; she is a hardworking mother who is helping her family by providing services of tailoring in her community. She is doing it for many years. She very well knows the techniques of stitching. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns enough to lead a decent life. To help her continue operations of her business, she requested for a loan of Rs. 40000/- to buy a stock of threads in different colors and packs of zippers and buttons to meet up with the increasing demand.  She is in her fourth loan cycle with good repayment history. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenues to deal with expenses of her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy a stock of threads in different colors and packs of zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Nafisa

texts.ru: Нафиса женщина с открытой душой и добрым сердцем. Она замужем и имеет совершеннолетних детей. Ее муж работает продавцом в дилерском центре. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами 17 лет назад она начала свой бизнес куплей продажей ткани. Она реализует свой товар на местном рынке. Нафиса старается достать и реализовать высококачественный товар. Она волнуется за здоровье женщин, которые покупают ткани и шьют платья для себя. Поэтому она советует своим клиентам покупать ткани из хлопка. Нафиса с бизнесом справляется сама. Она уже 16 цикл кредитуется в нашей организации и имеет хорошее кредитное досье. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 10000 сомони для покупки ткани для нового сезона. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Nafisa is a woman with an open mind and a good heart. She is married and has adult children. Her husband works as a salesman at a dealership. In order to provide the family with all the necessities, 17 years ago she started a business buying and selling fabric. She sells her goods at the local market. Nafisa tries to obtain and sell high-quality goods. She worries about the health of women who buy fabric and sew dresses themselves, so she advises her clients to buy fabric made of cotton. Nafisa manages the business herself. She has already been credited 16 times by our organization and has a good credit record. She is asking for a loan of 10,000 TJS to buy fabric for the new season. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy fabric for the new season

loans.name: Azra

texts.en: Ms Azra is a married woman. Her husband is a laborer. It was very tough for Azra to manage her household with the small income of her husband. Therefore she decided to help her husband in earning and started a business of cloth trade in her community. Azra buys cloths of different fabrics in various colors and designs from the market at wholesale rates and then sells them to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business. She is requesting a loan of Rs. 45,000 from the Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of cloths in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory. She expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and  plans to spend the part of her profits for the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of cloths in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory.

loans.name: Sumera

texts.en: Ms Sumera is 19 years old single lady. The man shown in the photo is Sumera’s brother who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. For this reason, Sumera has applied for a loan of Rs 15,000, for her brother. He wants to buy new tires for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Sumera is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her brother and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires for her brother's vehicle.

loans.name: Rukhsana

texts.en: Ms Rukhsana is a 25 year old vigorous lady and a mother of three children. The man shown in the photo is Rukhsana’s husband who is providing services of vehicle repairing from the last 8 years. By the time he has established good clients and makes enough to meet the household expenses. However, due to lack of availability of funds he is unable to meet with the daily demands of his customers. For this reason Rukhsana requested a loan of Rs 35,000 to Kashf Foundation. In this way her husband would be able to purchase more equipment such as screws, nails and spare parts to provide better services to his customers.  Rukhsana is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to purchase more equipment such as screws, nails and spare parts.

loans.name: Allah-Rakhi

texts.en: Ms Allah-Rakhi is a 51-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small grocery store at the corner of her house. She has gain eight years of experience in this field.  Her husband also assists her by purchasing stock of goods from the market as he has maintained many contacts in years. She is a mother of four children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health. She wants to grow her business so she requested a loan of PKR 20,000 to buy packs of salts, grains and beverages to meet with the increasing demand at her store. She is expecting boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salts, grains and beverages to meet with the increasing demand at her store.

loans.name: Fotima

texts.ru: Фотима жизнерадостная и трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 39 лет, замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Он всегда упорно работает для получения дохода и имеет более чем 9 лет опыта в бизнесе. Она занимается куплей продажей продукты питания в продовольственном магазине. В последнее время у нее мало клиентов, так как конкуренция большая. Она должна срочно расширить свой ассортимент для того, чтобы увеличить количество своих клиентов. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони  для того, чтобы купить хлеб, масло, колбасные изделия, консервы, напитки и молочные продукты. Она надеется на вас и на вашу доброту.
texts.en: Fotima is a happy and hardworking woman.  She is 39 years old, married and raising three children.  She always works hard to earn an income and has more than nine years of experience in business.  She is involved in buying and selling food products at a food market.  Lately, she has had few clients because the competition is high.  She needs to urgently expand her product assortment in order to increase the number of customers.  Fotima is requesting a loan in the amount of 2000 somoni to purchase bread, butter, sausage, canned goods, beverages and dairy products.  She relies on you and your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase bread, butter, sausage, canned goods, beverages and dairy products in order to expand product selection

loans.name: Caridad

texts.en:
Caridad is a 57 year old married woman from the town of Talibon, Bohol. She is engaged in fishing business together with her husband for more than 10 years now. This is the source of their income.
Caridad is asking for a loan to buy fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and others. Through this loan, her husband will be able to improve his catch thus giving them more fish to sell in the market. In the future, Caridad hopes of making their business a success in the future.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and others

loans.name: Sharifmo

texts.ru: Шарифмо 58 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 1 ребенка. Шарифмо старается обеспечить свою семью с хорошим условием проживания, так как ее муж работает охранником и получает маленькую зарплату. Шарифмо работает учительницей в средней школе. Она имеет большого опыта. Шарифмо тратит свою зарплату для покупки всех не обходимых средства для проживания. Она не имеет сбережения для проведения свадебного торжества своей единственной дочери. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1500 сомони для проведения свадьбы дочери, которая планирует очень скоро выйти замуж. Она ждет вашу доброту и верит, что этот займ поможет ей сделать счастливой ее дочери.
texts.en: Sharifmo is 58 years old, married and raising one child.  Sharifmo tries to provide her family with good living conditions because her husband works as a security guard and receives a small salary.  Sharifmo works as a teacher at a secondary school.  She has a lot of experience.  Sharifmo spends her entire salary on purchasing living necessities.  She does not have savings for holding a wedding celebration for her only daughter.  She is requesting a loan in the amount of 1500 somoni to hold a wedding for her daughter, who plans to get married very soon.  She awaits your kindness and believes that this loan will help her to make her daughter happy.

loans.use: to hold a wedding for her daughter

loans.name: Alerowen

texts.en:
Alerowen is a resident of Talibon, Bohol. Alerowen earns a living through his food vending and hog raising business. This is he source of his income. 
Alerowen is asking for a loan to buy cooking ingredients like meat, rice, vegetables, cooking oil and seasonings. Through this, he will be able to improve his business and augment his income.

loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients like meat, rice, vegetables, cooking oil and seasonings

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en: Evangeline earns a living through her sari-sari or variety store business. She sells various goods and items  to the people in her place. Evangeline is asking for a loan to buy more stocks to sell like canned goods, candies, soda, soap and toiletries and others. Through this, she will be able to improve her stocks and attract more buyers in her store thus improving her sales and profit.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell like canned goods, candies, soda, soap and toiletries and others

loans.name: Jaypee

texts.en: Jaypee earns a living through his buying and selling of fish and other seafood products to the people in his place in  Talibon, Bohol. Jaypee is asking for a loan to buy more fish, lobster, seaweed and other seafood products. Through this, he will be able to sell more and augment his income thus allowing him to provide the needs of the family especially their daily food consumption.

loans.use: to buy more fish, lobster, seaweed and other seafood products

loans.name: Flordeliza

texts.en:
Flordeliza is engaged in fishing business together with her husband for more than four years now. This is the source of their income. Flordeliza is asking for a loan to buy new fishing nets .
In the future, Flordeliza dreams of making their business a success and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is a married woman and a mother of three children from the town of Talibon, Bohol. She is engaged in farming and cow raising business. This is the source of her income.
Evelyn is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the farm. Through this, she will be able to improve her farm and augment her harvest. In the future, Evelyn hopes of expanding her farm and makes it a stable source of her income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the farm

loans.name: Cristine

texts.en:
Cristine is a married woman and a mother of five children from Talibon, Bohol. She runs a sari-sari or variety store business selling various goods and items to the people in her place. This is the source of her income. 
Cristine is asking for a loan to buy more stocks to sell like canned goods, candies, noodles, rice and others. Through this, she will be able to improve her business and makes it a success.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell like canned goods, candies, noodles, rice and others

loans.name: Mark John

texts.en:
Mark John is a 26 year old married man and a father of two young children from Talibon, Bohol. He runs a sari-sari or variety store business selling various goods and items to the people in his place. Mark John is also a motorcycle driver.
Mark John is asking for a loan to buy more stocks to sell like canned goods, candies, noodles, biscuits and snack foods and to pay for the repair of the motorcycle. Through this loan, he will be able to improve his income and savings. In the future, Mark John dreams of making his business a success and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell like canned goods, candies, noodles, biscuits and snack foods and to pay for the repair of the motorcycle

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en: Marcelina earns a living through her food vending business for more than 10 years now.She lives with her family in the town of Getafe, Bohol. Marcelina sells home cooked snack foods to the people in her place. Marcelina is asking for a loan to buy flour, sugar, and other ingredients for food vending. Through this, she will be able to cook and sell more thus augmenting her sales and income. In the future, Marcelina dreams of making her business more profitable and stable.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, and other ingredients for food vending

loans.name: Luciana

texts.en:
Luciana is a married woman from the town of Talibon, Bohol. She is involved in fishing and seaweed farming business with her husband. They have been in this kind of livelihood for more than 5 years now.
Luciana is asking for a loan to buy seaweed seedlings and fishing nets. With this, her husband will be able to improve his catch as well as their seaweed farming and harvest.Luciana dreams for a better way of living together with her family.

loans.use: to buy seaweed seedlings and fishing nets

loans.name: Clarissa

texts.en:
Clarissa earns a living through her seaweed farming business together with her husband. They live in the town of Talibon, Bohol. Seaweed farming is the source of their income.
Clarissa is asking for a loan to buy seaweed seedlings, straw and rope. Through this loan, they will be able to improve their farm and harvest thus allowing them to sell more to the market. Clarissa hopes of making their business a stable source of their income.

loans.use: to buy seaweed seedlings, straw and rope

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.en: Felicitas and her husband with their four children live in the town of Talibon, Bohol. She started her rice farming business together with her husband in their place. As of now, she needs a loan to buy fertilizer for the rice field.Through this loan, they will be able to improve their farm and augment their harvest.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for the rice field

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is 52 year old married woman and a mother of three children from Getafe, Bohol. She is engaged in fishing business for more than 20 years now together with her husband. This is the source of her income.
Lucia is asking for a loan to buy fishing nets, nylon and others. With this, they will be able to improve their fishing business and augment their income.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, nylon and others

loans.name: Maristila

texts.en:
Maristila is a 43 year old farmer from the town of Talibon, Bohol. She has been engaged in this business for more than 4 years now. Her husband also works as a carpenter.
Maristila is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and materials for carpentry like hammer, measuring tape, nails. Through this loan, she will be able to improve their farm and their livelihood.
Maristila believes that through hard work and perseverance, she will be able to improve their way of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and materials for carpentry like hammer, measuring tape, nails

loans.name: Norina

texts.en: Norina is engaged in fishing business together with her husband for more than 2 years now. They live in Getafe, Bohol. Norina is asking for a loan to buy fishing nets, lead weights and hooks. With this, her husband will be able to improve his catch thus giving them more fish to sell in the market. In the future, Norina dreams of expanding their business and makes it a success.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, lead weights and hooks

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en: Teresita is engaged in fishing business with her husband for more than 10 years now. This is the source of their income. Teresita is asking for a  loan to buy fishing nets and to pay for the repair of the boat. Through this loan, her husband will be able to improve his catch thus giving them more fish to sell in the market. In the future, Teresita hopes of making their fishing business a success and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and to pay for the repair of the boat

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is a 43 year old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She is engaged in seaweed farming business for more than 3 years now together with her husband.
Rowena is asking for a loan to buy seaweed seedlings, straw and rope . Through this loan, she will be able to improve her farm as well as her harvest. In the future, Rowena dreams of making her business a success.

loans.use: to buy seaweed seedlings, straw and rope

loans.name: Sarah Jane

texts.en: Sarah Jane is a farmer from the town of Talibon, Bohol. She is a married woman and a mother of four children. Sarah Jane is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the farm. Through this loan, she will be able to improve her farm as well as her harvest. In the future, Sarah Jane hopes of expanding her business and makes it stable source of her income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the farm

loans.name: Merlina

texts.en: Merlina is a hardworking woman, running a sari-sari or variety store selling various goods to the people in her place. Through this business, she is able to provide the basic needs of the family like food and others. Merlina is asking for a loan to buy more stocks to sell like canned goods, noodles, rice, soda, chips and snack foods among others. Merlina is optimistic that this loan could help her improve her income and profit.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell like canned goods, noodles, rice, soda, chips and snack foods among others

loans.name: Ruth Margarita

texts.es:
A sus 58 años, la señora Ruth se dedica a la venta de productos alimenticios en un pequeño local ubicado en la ciudad de Medellín, el cual le permite generar los ingresos necesarios para su sostenimiento y el de su hijo. Su esposo murió hace varios años, por lo cual Ruth le tocó ser padre y madre al mismo tiempo. 
Debido a las condiciones climáticas, las ventas aún disminuido, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de surtido (licor, cerveza, mecatos y productos de la canasta familiar) con el propósito de ampliar su portafolio de servicios y reactivar las ventas. 
Espera mejorar su condición económica y poder disfrutar de una vejez alejada de las preocupaciones monetarias.
texts.en:
At 58 years old, Ruth sells food products in a small store located in the city of Medellín. This allows her to earn the necessary income to support herself and her son. Her husband died years ago, so Ruth had to be father and mother at the same time.

Due to weather conditions, sales are still down, so she is applying for a loan to buy stock (liquor, beer, snacks, and basic household goods). Her goal is to broaden her array of services and reactivate sales.

She hopes to improve her economic condition and be able to enjoy old age without financial worries.

loans.use: to buy stock (liquor, beer, snacks, and basic household goods).

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.en:
Adelaida is a fish vendor from Getafe, Bohol. She is a married woman and  has been in the business for more than 10 years now. This is the source of her income. Adelaida is asking for a loan to buy more fish to sell.
In the future, Adelaida dreams of making her business a success and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
Zenaida runs a sari-sari or variety store business in her place in Talibon, Bohol. She has been in the business for more than 2 years now. This is her source of income. Zenaida is asking for a loan to buy more stocks to sell like canned goods, candies, soda and others.
Zenaida dreams of making her business a success and sustainable through this loan.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell like canned goods, candies, soda and others

loans.name: Julideth

texts.en:
This is Julideth, a 28-year-old living in Taboo, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental, with her two children. To make a living, Julideth owns and operates a motorcycle transport service. She has been engaged in her business for two years and earns 4,000 a month from this activity.

She is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP from GDMPC, as a new member. She will use the loan to obtain maintenance for her motorcycle. She plans to use the additional revenue generated by the business to improve and extend her services.

loans.use: to maintain her motorcycle

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is 39 years old, single, and presently lives in South Poblacion, Siquijor, Siquijor. She has owned and operated a sari-sari (general store) for 20 years. She earns 7,000 pesos a month, to contribute to her family's costs of living. 

Now, Catherine has requested a loan amounting to PHP 35,000. She will use the loan to purchase more products to resell at her general store. She has been a PMPC member for two years, and she has shown good credit performance.

loans.use: to purchase inventory for her sari-sari (general) store

loans.name: Victor Mauricio

texts.es:
Víctor de 32 años de edad, es vendedor ambulante desde hace de 5 años. Comercializa gafas en el centro de la ciudad y labora de lunes a sábado de ocho de la  mañana a seis de la tarde. Gracias a su actividad su familia goza de un techo en donde vivir y de una comida con que calmar el hambre.
En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de surtido con el fin de aumentar sus ventas y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
Sueña con establecer su negocio en un local y ampliar su portafolio de productos.
texts.en:
32-year-old Víctor has been working as an itinerant street vendor for 5 years.  He sells glasses in the city center and works from Monday to Saturday, from 8.00am to 6.00pm.  Thanks to his business, his family have a roof over their head and food on the table.  

Víctor is currently requesting a loan to invest in buying stock so that he can increase his sales and improve his family's living conditions.  He dreams of setting up his business in a store and expanding his product portfolio.

loans.use: to buy glasses

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is a 65-year-old widow with an only child living in Macabayao, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. To earn a living, she manages her own piggery, having an income of 5,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) a month. She has been in this business for five years. 

She joined GDMPC in 2010 and decided to request a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase livestock feeds and other supplies. She plans to develop her business to supplement the family's income.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed and other supplies.

loans.name: Muhabbat

texts.ru: Мухаббат замужняя женщина. Ей 35 лет. У нее две дочери и один сын. Она с мужем и детьми проживает в районе Носири Хусрав в южной части страны. У Мухаббат среднее специальное образование. Она работает учительницей в сельской школе. Ее муж работает мастером по ремонту домов. Мухаббат одновременно занимается ратениеводством. Она в этой области уже 5 лет. При дворе дома у нее имеется небольшой участок орошаемой земли, на котором она выращивает овощи. Кредит берет для приобретения семян помидора.
texts.en: Muhabbat is a married woman. She is 35 years old. She has two daughters and one son. She and her husband and children live in the Nosiri Khusrav District in the southern part of the country. Muhabbat has specialty secondary education. She works as a teacher in a village school. Her husband works as a home repairman. Muhabbat is simultaneously involved in farming. She has been in this field for 5 years. In the courtyard of the house, she has a small plot of irrigated land where she grows vegetables. She is taking a loan for the purchase of tomato seeds.

loans.use: to purchase tomato seeds

loans.name: Zeneyda Del Socorro

texts.es: La señora Zeneyda habitante del municipio de Masaya, comerciante desde hace cuatro años  vende Ropa y cosmeticos para damas, su esposo trabaja para una casa privada, entre los dos se dividen los gastos del hogar, sus planes en un futuro es poder mejorar sus condiciones vida, con este credito invertira en su negocio ya que sus clientes le hacen encargos especiales y quiere aprovechar las festividades del dia de la Madre para que sus ventas aumente y obtener mejores ingresos. Agradece a Afodenic y Fondos Kiva por este apoyo que le estan brindado.
texts.en:
Zeneyda lives in the town of Masaya.  She has been a merchant for four years.  She sells women's clothing and cosmetics.  Her husband works for a private home.  They divide the household expenses between them.  Her plan for the future is to be able to improve her living conditions.

With this loan she'll invest in her business.  Her customers make special requests and she wants to make the most of the festivities for Mother's Day to increase her sales and earn more income.

She's grateful to AFODENIC and Kiva Funds for the support she's getting.

loans.use: to buy clothing and cosmetics

loans.name: Davronbek

texts.ru: Давронбеку 24 года. Он умный и трудолюбивый молодой человек. Давронбек не женатый и живет с родителями. Он учится в Гуманитарно-экономическом Институте. Он является успешным студентом  факультета Педагогики и биологии. Давронбек учится хорошо и отлично. Он упорно работает над собой и своими знаниями. Дополнительно он занимается выращиванием пшеницы   и картошки. Его отец помогает ему введение бизнеса. Он должен оплатить за учебный договор, но не имеет денег для этого. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Davronbek is 24 years old. He is an intelligent and hard-working young man. Davronbek is not married and lives with his parents. He studies in the Humanitarian-Economic Institute. He is a successful student in the areas of Pedagogy and Biology. Davronbek receives good grades. He works hard on himself and his knowledge. Additionally, he is engaged in growing wheat and potatoes. His father is helping him start a business. He has to pay for tuition, but does not have the money for it. He is asking for a loan to pay for tuition. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for tuition

loans.name: Idigul

texts.ru: Идигул трудолюбия и целеустремленная женщина. Ей 51 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Детям 15, 19, и 26 лет. Ее муж работает на местном рынке и получает маленькую зарплату. Идигул очень любит маленьких детей и более чем  13 лет работает в детском саде. Она работает воспитательницей. Маленькие дети очень любят ее. Идигул планирует отремонтировать свой дом, так как ее дом имеет плохое состояние. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, древесина, краски и т.п. Она ждет вашу доброту. Она как добросовестная женщина обещает погасить займ во время.
texts.en: Idigul is a hardworking and single-minded woman.  She's 51 years old, married and has three children aged 15, 19 and 26.  Her husband works at a local market and his pay is very little.  Idigul loves little children and for more than 13 years has worked at a kindergarten as a teacher.  Her students also love her very much.  Idigul is planning to make renovations to her home since it is currently in poor condition.  She is asking for a loan of 2,000 somoni to buy constructions materials like cement, wood, paint, etc., etc.  She awaits your kindness.  She, as a conscientious woman, promises to repay the loan promptly.

loans.use: To buy building materials such as cement, wood, paint for repairing house

loans.name: Rodrigo

texts.es:
Rodrigo es un joven de 20 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad de clima cálido caracterizada por su agricultura, en especial se cosecha la uva, el esparrago, el algodón, entre otros. Día a día Rodrigo labora alrededor de 9 horas como empleado en una tienda de ropa de su ciudad, puede atender hasta 15 clientes diariamente y con el fruto de su trabajo puede apoyar a sus padres con algunos gastos del hogar; Rodrigo cree que le está yendo bien es su trabajo porque es muy colaborador y atiende bien a sus clientes.

Rodrigo está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado el podrá realizar la construcción de un pequeño cuarto ya que parte de su vivienda es de adobe, así podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y seguir esforzándose y luchar para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su negocio propio”.
texts.en:
Rodrigo, 20, lives in the city of Ica, which has a warm climate and is characterized by its agriculture, especially grapes, asparagus, cotton, and other crops.

Rodrigo works around nine hours every day as an employee in a clothing store in his city.  He can serve up to 15 customers a day.  With the fruit of his labor he can help his parents with some of the household expenses.  Rodrigo thinks it's going well for him in his job because he's very cooperative and he gives his customers good service.

Rodrigo's very grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to their help he'll be able to build a small room, because part of his home is adobe.  This way he'll be able to improve his quality of life and continue making the effort and striving to make his biggest dream come true: "To have his own business."

loans.use: to build a room

loans.name: Celier
